nodes.text: Rupings were reptavians native to the planet of Onderon. The Onderon rebels used rupings as battle mounts during the Battle of Onderon.
Rupings were well-trained flying reptavians who were close to their owners and were very useful to the Onderon rebels. They had orange skin and four green eyes.
These creatures were named after The Clone Wars concept artist Tara Rueping.
Due to the creature's wing structure of the membranes not actually attaching to the main body, it should not be able to fly using its wings alone.[source?]
